BF3A73A24475B9398F3200813D420C6B: Find me in the land of The Ninja.
9B7EFF1641FEDBD92DED278C256AE3C4: Immense ice bears with sub-zero pelts used in crafting Ninja gear. Fearing the heat of the sun, these creatures are usually only found at night.
105AB9EE4AA66C9CA38CF4AE473F2C03: Seek the land where Ninja spin to find the elements locked within.
